details.name: bulbasaur
details.description:
A strange seed was
planted on its
back at birth. The plant sprouts
and grows with
this POKéMON.

details.name: ivysaur
details.description:
When the bulb on
its back grows
large, it appears to lose the
ability to stand
on its hind legs.

details.name: venusaur
details.description:
The plant blooms
when it is
absorbing solar energy. It stays
on the move to
seek sunlight.

details.name: charmander
details.description:
Obviously prefers
hot places. When
it rains, steam is said to spout
from the tip of
its tail.

details.name: charmeleon
details.description:
When it swings
its burning tail,
it elevates the temperature to
unbearably high
levels.

details.name: charizard
details.description:
Spits fire that
is hot enough to
melt boulders. Known to cause
forest fires
unintentionally.

details.name: squirtle
details.description:
After birth, its
back swells and
hardens into a shell. Powerfully
sprays foam from
its mouth.

details.name: wartortle
details.description:
Often hides in
water to stalk
unwary prey. For swimming fast, it
moves its ears to
maintain balance.

details.name: blastoise
details.description:
A brutal POKéMON
with pressurized
water jets on its shell. They are
used for high
speed tackles.

details.name: caterpie
details.description:
Its short feet
are tipped with
suction pads that enable it to
tirelessly climb
slopes and walls.

details.name: metapod
details.description:
This POKéMON is
vulnerable to
attack while its shell is soft,
exposing its weak
and tender body.

details.name: butterfree
details.description:
In battle, it
flaps its wings
at high speed to release highly
toxic dust into
the air.

details.name: weedle
details.description:
Often found in
forests, eating
leaves. It has a sharp
venomous stinger
on its head.

details.name: kakuna
details.description:
Almost incapable
of moving, this
POKéMON can only harden its shell
to protect itself
from predators.

details.name: beedrill
details.description:
Flies at high
speed and attacks
using its large venomous stingers
on its forelegs
and tail.

details.name: pidgey
details.description:
A common sight in
forests and woods.
It flaps its wings at ground
level to kick up
blinding sand.

details.name: pidgeotto
details.description:
Very protective
of its sprawling
territorial area, this POKéMON will
fiercely peck at
any intruder.

details.name: pidgeot
details.description:
When hunting, it
skims the surface
of water at high speed to pick off
unwary prey such
as MAGIKARP.

details.name: rattata
details.description:
Bites anything
when it attacks.
Small and very quick, it is a
common sight in
many places.

details.name: raticate
details.description:
It uses its whis­
kers to maintain
its balance. It apparently
slows down if
they are cut off.
